ygData.subject: RE: New Lullaby theory
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If the sign error is what I think it is, the song will actually work better against red mobs than against green ones. -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 23 Feb 2000, Steve Quarterman wrote:
>
> Hmmm maybe I had a streak of very good luck last night.
> I was in the penthouse in the Aviak city and I had rooks
> nodding off left and right when we got in trouble. I was
> the lowest level up there at 18 and was not using any
> instruments. The sleeping rooks would occasionally wake
> up swing at me then nod back off. I just had to be sure I
> told the others to leave them alone and let them sleep.
> The rooks were red to me. At one time we had a Harrier
> that we were attacking and 2 sleeping rooks. Sure sounds
> to me like it is working properly.

If the sign error is what I think it is, the song will
actually work better against red mobs than against green
ones.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
